#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int a[8]={10,100,1000,10000,100000,1000000,10000000,100000000};
    int b[30]={2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288,1048576,2097152,4194304,8388608,16777216,33554432,67108864,134217728,268435456,536870912};

int t,s,n,r,m,i,f1,f2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        s=1;
        f1=0;
        f2=0;
        cin>>n>>r;
        m=n;
        for(i=1;i<=r;i++)
        {
            s*=m;
            s/=i;
            m--;
        }
        for(i=0;i<8;i++)
        {
            if(s<a[i])
            {
                f1=i+1;
                break;
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<30;i++)
        {
            if(s<b[i])
            {
                f2=i+1;
                break;
            }
        }
        //cout<<s<<endl;
        cout<<f1<<" "<<f2<<endl;

    }
}
